experiment.name: Transcription profiling of Arabidopsis thaliana seedlings after exposure to low R/FR light for a short and a long period of time

description.text: Aim of the experiment is the identification of regulatory genes rapidly induced by low R/FR and still up-regulated after prolonged exposure to FR-rich light. To this end, gene expression changes were analysed in Arabidopsis thaliana seedlings after exposure to low R/FR light for a short and a long period of time. The experiment was designed to enable comparison between treated and untreated Arabidopsis seedlings.

bibliography.authors: Sessa, Giovanna; Carabelli, Monica; Sassi, Massimiliano; Ciolfi, Andrea; Possenti, Marco; Mittempergher, Francesca; Becker, Jorg; Morelli, Giorgio; Ruberti, Ida
bibliography.title: A dynamic balance between gene activation and repression regulates the shade avoidance response in Arabidopsis

bibliography.authors: Andrea Ciolfi; Giovanna Sessa; Massimiliano Sassi; Marco Possenti; Samanta Salvucci; Monica Carabelli; Giorgio Morelli; Ida Ruberti
bibliography.title: Dynamics of the Shade-Avoidance Response in Arabidopsis
